domain.interactions

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.interactions.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Clear, Continue, Go, Help, Inspect, Interact, Quit, Show, Start

    public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    The parent class to all commands. The Command class creates the foundation for all the Commands and have all the necessary methods to validate the command as well as the parameter (if any). A collection of all the commands are stored in Commands, which also handles which command to run at what time.
    See Also:
    Commands, Parser, InteractionsController

      • validateCommand

        protected boolean validateCommand(java.lang.String commandWord)
        Validate that this command can be used if called.
        Parameters:
        commandWord - The command String to validate. (Will compare with command name.
        Returns:
        false if the command does not match and true if it does.
